rules_text:
Cenotaph Possessor gets +1/+1 for each artifact, creature, and/or enchantment you control. [i](A permanent that's more than one of those types counts only once for this effect.)[/i]
{2}{W}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact, creature, and/or enchantment you control until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
